name: Breanna Walker

text: At this  covid time am happy to see how they put distance between their customers. You can enjoy your food without being worried....

name: Anthony Gouveia

name: Ryan Neville

name: Lakia Baucom
text: Excellent service! Faith was our waitress and she was awesome! Food was good. Took a while to come but the manager rectified the wait with a dessert. We had the butter cake and it was the best dessert that I have had at a restaurant. Highly recommend this location.

name: Gess
text: This is the first time to a restaurant since COVID started. All staff members wore masks. Restaurant had seating arranged to follow the social distancing rules. Bar area was closed. Food was fast. Food was good. Waitress was nice.

name: Lisa Callaway
text: I went here for lunch with my Mom today, and we had a great experience!  Our food was tasty (sticky Asian cauliflower bites, a bbq chicken pizza and a spinach artichoke thin crust pizza), it arrived quickly, and everyone was super friendly. ‚Ä¶More

name: anthony miyashiro
text: I've never had a bad experience at this location, from the staff to the food all great.

name: PD Kana
text: Pretty good. Thai salad and avocado spring rolls are a plus for me. Liking the caramel pudding dessert too.

name: Leonard Letoto
text: My wife and I have been coming here since it opened. We've always had positive experiences here but the last few times, it's gone downhill a bit. ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Cook
text: Pizza was good. Order online and wait in line. We were told it would be about 40 min to pick up our food, but it wasn't done for about 60-70 min. They seemed a little short staffed, understandable, but everyone was friendly.

name: Luke Meyers
text: Great location for Kapolei. Food was fresh and tasty. Had the Sicilian Pizza, more spice would be nice. Prices about $18 for entree for night out.

name: Joaquin Diaz
text: California Pizza Kitchen is located inside Ka Makana Alii near the movie theater. It gets pack quickly so arrive early for lunch or dinner. The food is delicious and eye popping presentation. The staff is welcoming and fast to assist. An overall great experience. By the way, the cauliflower crust pizza is the best.

name: Jean Paul
text: Had a great dinner and good service

name: Kris Miyashiro
text: Love this place!  The staff are so efficient and super friendly.  Major social distancing precautions in place so we felt very safe!

name: Michael Althouse
text: Preordered food 2 weeks in advance. Stood outside of the restaurant for over an hour after pick up time. No apologies, no care whatsoever. When we got the food, it was cold. Would recommend this place if you have a lot of time. Because they can waste it for you.

name: Michael Peters
text: Great food but cant seem to give forks when ordering to go which makes me never want to go there again. This is the 4th time now and now wont ever get a penny from me. Not a caveman, I dont eat salad and dessert with my hands like a barbarian

text: Pretty good although it was crazy busy during dinner time kitchen was running behind but our server kept checking up on us and assuring that the food we be at our table shortly.
